metadata.title: CVE-2024-43380 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: fugit contains time tools for flor and the floraison group. The fugit"natural" parser, that turns "every wednesday at 5pm" into "0 17 * * 3",accepted any length of input and went on attempting to parse it, notreturning promptly, as expected. The parse call could hold the thread withno end in sight. Fugit dependents that do not check (user) input length forplausibility are impacted. A fix was released in fugit 1.11.1.

criterions.comment: ruby-fugit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
